title: Introducing: Linying
body:
One listen to _Paris 12_, the latest release from Singapore’s **Linying**, and it’s easy to see why tastemakers are tripping over themselves to praise her intimate, emotionally fragmented songwriting.

With two previous tracks, _Sticky Leaves_ and _Alpine_, both racking up over a million plays on Spotify a piece, there’s an endearingly simplicity to her sound, that allows her elegant vocal and reassuring songwriting to truly soar. This is breathtaking stuff. Check out _Paris 12_ and _Sticky Leaves_ below.

Like this? Follow our [New Music](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) playlist for the best new tracks around right now.
